data.prayer: Father, help the 14,489 believers in Kâmpóng Thum to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kâmpóng Thum, Cambodia
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Kâmpóng Thum, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Kâmpóng Thum, Cambodia today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide the 14,489 believers in the state of Kâmpóng Thum into all truth as they interpret Scriptures.
data.verse: For the word of God is alive and active. Sharper than any double-edged sword, it penetrates even to dividing soul and spirit, joints and marrow;

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Khmer Krom people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Kâmpóng Thum, Cambodia.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 14,489 believers in Kâmpóng Thum, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Kâmpóng Thum, Cambodia to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.
